text:
INFORMATION OF.
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
July 9, 1956
Mr. Kenneth D. Wright
Director of Broadcasting
Station WUOT (FM)
University of Tennessee
Knoxville, Tennessee
Dear Ken:
The newly constituted Programming Planning Subcommittee
of the Radio Network Committee Consists of the following:
Dick Vogl, WOI, Iowa State College, Ames, Iowa, chairman
Lee S. Dreyfus, WDET, Wayne University, Detroit, Mich,
and the three members of the present Acceptance
Subcommittee:
John A. Regnell, WILL, University of Illinois, Urbana,
Ill., Hugh Mix, WNAD, University of Oklahoma,
Norma, Okla., Edward J. Slack, University of
South Dbkota, Vermillion, S# D.
Whenever you need the help, advice, assistance of this gang,
please fire away.
Meanwhile, please accept my sincere thanks for all of your
help. My good wishes go with you to the Center. Maybe I*il
be seeing you.
Best regards.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Schooley
President
FES/rcjf
cc: H. J. Skornla
H. K. Newburn
R. B. Hudson
